name: appalachia
description: GeoJSON file of counties in Appalachia, as defined by the Appalachian Regional Commission

scripts.create_appalachia_geojson: ./bin/joinjson.js --leftprop features ./build/us_counties.geojson properties.GEOID ./build/arc_counties.json FIPS | ./bin/filterjson.js --prop features - "typeof val.properties.SUBREGION != 'undefined'" > appalachia.geojson
scripts.build: run-s create_build_dir download_county_geojson download_county_data create_county_json create_appalachia_geojson

author: Geoff Hing
